articles.title: Fire at an Istanbul nightclub kills at least 29 people - The Associated Press
articles.description: A fire broke out at an Istanbul nightclub during renovations, killing at least 29 people. One person was injured. The nightclub was on the ground and basement floors of a 16-story residential building on the European side of the city. The fire was extinguishe…
articles.content: ISTANBUL (AP) A fire engulfed a popular Istanbul nightclub Tuesday during renovations, trapping workers and employees inside and killing at least 29 people, officials and reports said. Several people… [+2168 chars]
